page.title: 12CLUBS AND SOCIETIES
page.content: In Albrighton there are over 40 different clubs or societies for children.For instance there's Brownie's, Football Club, Nursery School, Playschool and many more.Children in their teens can go to Guides, Cricket Club, Conservation Society, Young Farmers, to mention just a few.Adults have got even more choice, Allotments Association, Albrighton Arts, Round Table, Slimming Club, and many more.People from all ages go to clubs or societies nearly every day.It's also a help to the unemployed.They can go to use up their time.Albrighton is well provided for. There are a wide range of activities to suit all interests.
